biography: Lauri, a celebrated figure from Jyväs-Golf, is known for his meticulous approach to the game. While his presence on the course is marked by intense focus, those who know him well speak of a jovial and generous spirit off the greens.

Having appeared once in past Hector Trophée events, Lauri has made the decision to step away from the competition, marking a significant moment in the tournament's history. Although Lauri will not be participating in Hector Trophée 2025, his contributions to the sport remain noteworthy, and his presence will be missed.
